general: Augmente les dégâts de Roquette de 5% pour chaque 20% de la sante de la coque manquant sur le navire du joueur

Augmente Régen. d'endurance de 50%

Augmente Gamme de capacités de l'équipage de 5%

1: Augmente Rayon de la zone d'effet de Mortier de 5%
Augmente Niveau de protection équipée de 5%
Augmente les Dégâts aux structures de 5 %

Reduces Reload Time of Bombard weapons by 5%

Increases duration of the Flooded status effect on a target by 12%

Augmente la durée de l'effet d'état Voiles déchirées sur une cible de 8%

Réduit le temps de chargement des armes de Baliste de 10%

description.general: Les coups portés au point faible d'une cible ont 35% de chance de déclencher une frappe de foudre dévastatrice infligeant 3000 Dégâts électriques
Prevents a killing blow from sinking this ship and this ship becomes invulnerable for the next 5 seconds. This effect has a 180 second cooldown
Réduit les dégâts de l'effet d'état Électrifié de 25%

general: Augmente Taux de chargement de l'effet d'état Électrifié sur une cible de 8%
Augmente la durée de l'effet d'état Électrifié sur une cible de 8%
Après avoir déclenché l'effet d'état Électrifié sur une cible, augmente les dégâts de la prochaine attaque de 50%
Augmente Taux de chargement de l'effet d'état En feu de 10% sur les cibles déjà affectées par l'effet d'état Électrifié
Augmente les dégâts des armes Électriques de 5M
Les dégâts infligés à moins de 200 m appliquent des charges de "Moqué". Appliquer Moqué avec ce navire rend la cible vulnérable à 50%, augmentant les dégâts de point faible de toutes les sources.
Augmente Force de préparation de 150 % et Récupération de la force de préparation de 25 %

1: Augmente la santé de la coque à 53000
Augmente Force de Préparation à 26500
3: Augmente la vitesse de réglage à 16nd

general: Subit 2% de dégâts en moins par attaque à chaque fois qu'il y a préparation aux dégâts reçus. Cet effet peut se cumuler jusqu'à 20% et expire si aucun dégât n'a été reçu durant la préparation au cours des 12 dernières secondes.
Inflige des charges de "Moqué" aux cibles hostiles dans un rayon de 125 m tout en se préparant contre les coups.
Réduit de 20 % la consommation d'endurance de l'équipage lors du réglage des voiles
Augmente Régen. d'endurance de 50%
+5% de vitesse de rechargement

description.general: 10% des dégâts infligés par cette arme restaurent la santé de la coque

general: Damaging status effects on your ship will spread to any enemy ships you ram
Increases the duration of damaging status effects on your ship by 30%
Reduces damage from status effects on your ship by 30%
Toucher un point faible applique Charge de moquerie sur la cible
Augmente durée de la Moquerie de 15%

Reduces Threat Generation of nearby friendly ships by 60%
Increases Taunt Bonus Threat by 40%
Increases Threat Generation by 25%

Augmente la durée de l'effet d'état En feu sur une cible de 8%

description.1: Augmente la Portée maximale de Baliste de 10%

general: Weapon damage is increased based on how far you are from the target, capped at 60%
When your Hull Health is 40% or lower, increases Armor by 500 and trimming no longer costs stamina for 10 seconds. This effect has a cooldown of 40 seconds

Augmente Force de Préparation à 7600
3: Augmente la vitesse de réglage à 16nd

general: Increase Piercing weapon damage by 20%. Increases to 30% when hitting a target with Punctured
Le canon long n'est plus uniquement une arme du pont supérieur lorsqu'il est équipé à la proue
Long Guns equipped at the bow will deal 40% less damage and have 60% longer reload times
Increases damage to structures by 50% and increases Weakpoint Damage taken by 30% for 10 seconds
Weapon hits have a 20% chance to trigger Fury on self for 15 seconds, boosting Broadside Weapon Damage by 20%
While active, broadside hits can trigger a 700 damaging explosion every 3s within a 100m Blast Radius

Increases Brace Strength to 8200

description.general: All weapons equipped on the broadsides on this ship will deal bonus 20% explosive damage and decreases explosive weapon Reload Time by 10%

general: Augmente les dégâts infligés par cette arme de 5% après chaque coup.
L'effet se réinitialise au bout de 7 secondes après le coup initial.
Tire rapidement des fléchettes de feu marin jusqu'à une portée de 250 m.
L'arme prend un moment pour s'enrouler avant de tirer.

description.general: Chaque cible touchée provoque un arc de foudre qui frappe l'ennemi le plus proche dans un rayon de 150 m, infligeant 2500 Dégâts électriques.
La bouée déployée crée un dôme protecteur qui est faible contre les dégâts perforants.
L'utilisation d'une attaque d'équipage augmente les dégâts de l'arme de flanc de 33% et la récupération d'endurance de 100M pendant les 15 secondes suivantes
Ramming a target repairs your ship's Hull Health by 138% of damage inflicted
Quand vous vous préparez, réduit la durée des effets d'état négatifs de 10% de leur durée maximale chaque seconde.

While bracing, the effects of being afflicted with Ablaze is negated
Reduces damage taken by Burning Weapons by 30% and by an additional 30% while bracing
Increases weapon damage by 15% while Hull Health is above 75%

general: During the first 2s of Bracing, any damage taken is reduced by 3000
After 2s, Bracing reduces damage taken by 200
Activating bracing consumes twice as much Crew Stamina

description.general: Summons a Lightning strike after 2s at the location a show lands, dealing 2000 Electric Damage

general: Hits have a 15% chance to inflict a delayed epxlosion that deals 7500 damage in a 65m radius after 4s
This chance increases to 100% when hitting a weakpoint
May only inflict one delayed attack per target

description.general: Fires 3 shots at once. Deals additional 400 fire damage if all 3 shots hit the same target

description.1: Adds 10% of damage as Explosive Damage
description.2: Adds 20% of damage as Explosive Damage
description.3: Adds 30% of damage as Explosive Damage

general: Hits have a 3% chance to inflict a delayed explosion that deals 7500 damage in a 65m radius after 4s
May only inflict one delayed attack per target
Weapon hits against a target with a damaging status effect have a 5% chance to fully recharge those status effects. This effect has a 30s cooldown
Increases Secondary Damage of Broadside Weapons by 10%
Increases Broadside Weapons damage by 5%
Reduces duration of all damaging status effects applied to your ship by 50% but increases damage dealt by these by 15%
Reduces incoming Secondary Damage by 10%
Increases Max Hull Health by 6%
Triggering Shell-Shocked on the target increases the Reload Time of their weapons by 20% for 10s
Increases Secondary Damage of Explosive Weapons by 20%
Increases weapon damage of Explosive Weapons by 5%
Triggering Ablaze on the target also increases Shell-Shocked charge rate by 50% for 7s
Inceases Fire Rate of Explosive Weapons by 20%
Increases damage to structures by 5%
Decreases Reload Time of Front and Rear Weapons by 9%
Increases Secondary Damage dealt by Front and Rear weapons by 9%
Decreases Reload Time of Broadside Weapons by 7%
Increases Secondary Damage dealt by Broadside Weapons by 7%
Increases Secondary Damage dealt by up to 20% the closer the target is, reduced by 2% per 50m to the target
Increases Charge Rate of the Shell-Shocked effect on enemy ships by 5%
Increases damage dealt by the Shell-Shocked status effect on a target by 3%
Reduces incoming Secondary Damage for every 100m to attack, capped at 30% at 600m
Reduces incoming Piercing Charge from enemy ships by 8%
Increases Armor Rating of equipped armor by 3%

description.15: Increases Projectile Speed of Mortar by 15%
Increases Projectile Speed of Rocket by 15%

description.1: Increases Repair Amount from Repair Weapons by 6%

general: Gain a stack of Grit when you take damage. Each stack of Grit increases Armor by 40, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Each stack of Grit lasts 15 seconds
Allied XSML, SML and MED ships within 200m take 10% reduced damage. When you have 10 stacks of Grit, reduce 20% damage instead

description.general: Reduces Sailing Speed in Rivers and Shallows by 30%
Increases received damage to Weakpoints by 30%

1: Increases Hull Health to 104000
Increases Brace Strength to 31200

general: At 10 stacks of Grit, taking damage grants you Resolve
Resolve restores 10% Brace Strength on activation, decreases status effect damage by 20% and increases threat generation by 100% for 10 seconds
Removes all negative status effects from the ship
Immunity against status effects for 20 seconds
Each volley of cannon fire on enemy sails has a chance of summoning a lightning strike that deals 5000 Electric Damage
Every 5 hits adds a 15% chance, up to a maximum of 45%
Lightning strike damage increases to 10000 if target has Torn Sails
Every 1% of Burning Damage also increases the build-up rate of the Vulnerable status effect by 1%
Additionally increases the build-up rate of Vulnerable by 40%

description.general: 20% of damage dealt restores Hull Health, increasing by 5% for every 50m the target is at distance, up to a maximum of 50%

general: Rains 60 rockets over an extended period of time
50% of Flooding Damage is dealt as Severe Damage
Reduces target's movement speed by 50% and Armor by 20% for 3s
Makes Weeping Specters vulnerable to damage
The punctured status effect is 50% less effective in reducing Armor
Reduces duration of the Punctures status effect by 15%

description.general: Receives 5% less damage from structures, and an additional 1% for every 3000 Brace Strength
When at half-sails or anchored, receive 20% less damage from hits

general: When hit while Bracing, an explosion is triggered, which deals 3500 Explosive Damage in a 100m Blast Radius
This effect has a 10s cooldown
Hits from a Culverin have 25% chance to spread to a nearby target within 100m, dealing 25% of the original damage. Does not work for Repair Weapons
Increases Projectile Speed of Culverin by 10%
Reduces Reload Time by 5% and increases Secondary Damage of Auxiliary Weapons by 7% for each weapon quadrant being reloaded
While not trimming sails, increases weapon damage for Auxiliary Weapons by 9%
Increases Turning Speed by 8%
Increases damage to structures by 20% for Siege Weapons and repair amount of Repair Weapons by 18%, when more than 160m away from the target
Siege weapons deal 4% increases weapon damage. Repair Weapons repair 7% more Hull Health
Increases Projectile Speed of Siege Weapons and Repair Weapons by 10%, except for Sea Fire and Auxiliary Weapons

description.general: Detonation also applies Shell-shocked to all targets
Explosive Damage from this weapon deals 300% increased damage to structures
Adds 30% of damage as Explosive Damage in a 30m Blast Radius

description.1: Increases Stamina Recovery by 10%
Increases Maximum Stamina by 7%
Increases Acceleration and Deceleration by 16%
Reduces Crew Stamina Depletion when trimming sails by 15%
Increases Acceleration by 26%

general: Increases Repair Amount of weapons by 21% for targets below 70% Hull Health
1% of Repair Amount also restores 0.1% Crew Stamina to the target
Reduces Reload Time of Repair Weapons by 11%
While above 50% Hull Health, reduces incoming Secondary Damage by 24%, and increases Threat Generation by 15% and weapon damage by 10%
Increases Armor Rating of equipped armor by 100
After 10 consecutive hits on targets, applies the Sea's Roar status effect to your ship and the nearest ally within 150m. Missing a shots resets the counter
Sea's Roar increases the Secondary Damage dealt by 17% and reduces incoming Secondary Damage by 15% for 17s
Decreases Reload Time of Weapons by 7%
After receiving 12 hits, gains the Sea's Ward status effect for 30s, with a cooldown of 60s
Sea's Ward increases Brace Strength by 18%. 3% of weapon damage builds up the Taunted status effect on enemies
Reduces Crew Stamina Depletion while Bracing by 14%
After ramming a target, increases Acceleration by 300% for 5s
When sailing against the wind, increases Top Speed by 10% and reduces Crew Stamina Depletion while in combat by 10%

When attacking a target under Poisoned status effect, it increases the damage and duration of the Poisoned status effect by 6% and 20% respectively for each consecutive hit up to 30% increased damage and 100% increased duration. Weapon hit has a chance to cause a poison explosion of 300m on the target, dealing 1000 Toxic damage to hostile enemies
Increase Toxic Weapons damage by 20% and Poisoned charge up rate by 150%

description.general: When attacking an enemy ship under the Poisoned status effect, the enemy ship deals 50 Toxic Damage per second to nearby targets within 300m for 10 seconds. Decreases damage received from targets affected by the Poisoned status effect by 30%
Killing a target grants a 100% boost to Maximum Brace Strength for 11s and instantly restores 60% Brace Strength and 25% Hull Health. This effect has a cooldown of 60s
While bracing, increase Acceleration and Turning Speed by 2% each second. When Bracing ends, retain acceleration and Turning Speed for 6s. For this duration, increase Sailing Speed by 14%
Reduces the damage that passes through Brace Strength to Hull Health due to the Poisoned status effect by 50%. Also reduces duration of Poisoned status effect by 25%

general: Hits with a Toxic Weapon on a target within 250m, deal 10% more damage if they are Bracing
Poisoned Status effects applied to targets within 250m deal 10% increased damage
Increases Toxic Damage to enemy ships by 8%
Gain 0.8% weapon damage per 1kts of sailing Speed
If no damage is received while trimming for 5s, reduce the reload time of Broadside Weapons by 12% for 10s
Increases Acceleration by 20%
Hitting a target over 180m away, increases damage of Demicannon weapons by 17% for 12s
Increases Projectile Speed of Demicannon Weapons by 14%
Increases Maximum Range of Demicannon Weapons by 12%
If the target is Poisoned, increases the damage of Toxic weapons by 10%
Increases Projectile Speed of Toxic Weapons by 12%
Increases Maximum Range of Toxic Weapons by 10%
Dealing damage with a Flooding Weapon from over 200m away, increases Flooding Damage by 13% for 10s
For every 1% increase in Projectile Speed of Weapons through any bonuses, increase Flooding Damage of those weapons by 1%
Increases damage to enemy ships with the Flooded effect by 10%
For every 5m Area-of-Effect Radius of the weapon, increase weapon damage as Electric Damage by 2%
Reduces Reload Time of Electric Weapons by 6%
Increases Damage to enemy ships with the Stormstruck effect by 8%
Increases weapon damage of Sea Fire by 13%
Increases Secondary damage of Sea Fire by 15%
Increases Charge rate of the Poisoned status effect on a target by 8%
Increases duration of the Poisoned effect on enemy ships by 8%

description.general: Hitting the same target 8 times deals 13% Toxic damage to nearby enemies within 150m. Weapon damage increases by 1% for each subsequent hit on the same target
Fires a streak of lightning that can chain up to 4 targets in proximity. Increases damage by 1% per 10m of weapon range. Adds 75m to weapon range
50% of Toxic damage reduces Maximum Brace Strength for 10s. If the target is Poisoned, Toxic damage is increased by 75%
When armed, afflicts target with the Gaseous status effect for 4s, which deals 300 Poison damage per second to all enemies in 150m from the target. Effect can be stacked up to 8 times
Hitting a Weakpoint deals 150% of Flooding damage as an extra burst of Severe Damage. If a target is Flooded, the extra burst damage is increased to 200%
Hits have a 15% chance to inflict a delayed explosion dealing 2500 damage in a 65m radius after 4s. The chance increases by 15% with each additional target hit, limited to 5 targets at 75% chance

general: For each successful shot on enemies or repair on allies, apply a stack of Flagbearer. On enemy targets, each stack increases the damage dealt to the target by 1% per stack, up to 20%. On allies, increases repair received by the target by 2.% per stack, up to 50%
Allied XSML, SML and MED ships within 500m gain 5% increased damage and 5% repair amount
Increases Hull Health restored by Repair Weapons by 5% per Repair Weapon equipped

1: Increases Hull Health to 83200
Increases Brace Strength to 16640

general: At the maximum number of Stacks of Flagbearer, targets will receive additional 10% weapon damage. Allies will repair Severe Damage by 1% of incoming repair received
Flagbearer lasts 20s

description.general: Gains a stack of Living Metal per second if no damage was taken in the last 5s. Stacks of Living Metal increases Armor Rating by 10% per stack, up to 150% at 15 stacks. Loses a stack on every hit taken. Bracing will not reduce stacks
Reduces damage taken by Sea Monster attacks by 15% or by 30% when Bracing. Increases Weapon Damage by 10% for 30s after bracing a Sea Monster attack

general: Holding Brace charges up a repair pulse that restores up to 1.5% Hull Health per second for 12s to allies within 150m. Fully charging a pulse gives allies 12% reduced damage for the duration. This effect cannot stack
Activating and maintaining Bracing consumes 50% more Crew Stamina
Deals 14% more weapon damage on Taunted targets
Increases duration of the Taunted status effect on a target by 15%
While at full sails or trimming, reduces the duration of Poisened status effect by 50%
Reduces incoming Toxic Damage by 16%
Reduces damage done to Brace Strength by Sea Monster attacks by 18%
Reduces damaging Status Effect and Curse Mark duration by 10%
After 4 consecutive hits on a Sea Monster, reduces Reload Time of Broadside Weapons by 15% for 20s. Missing a shot resets the counter
Consecutive hits on Sea Monster weakpoints deal 10% more Secondary Damage up to 40% for 5s
Increases weapon damage to Sea Monster by 10%
When dealing damage to a target with reduced Max Hull Health, Flooding Weapons deals 15% more weapon damage for 20s with a cooldown of 60s
Flooded status effect applied to targets within 250m have a 12% increased duration
Reduces Reload Time of Flooding Weapons by 10%
Dealing 2000 damage with a Ballista Weapon to a target marks them for 20s. While Marked, target receives 12% more damage from Ballista Weapons and more Secondary Damage from all sources
Reduces Charge Time of Ballista Weapons by 18%
Increases Weakpoint Damage of Ballista Weapons by 14%

description.general: Landing 15 hits in a single volley increases the weapon damage the target receives by 8% for 10s. If the target is Poisoned, they will receive 12% more damage from all sources

general: Hits on allies apply a stack that restores 1% Hull Health over 2s, up to 10 stacks for 10% over 20s. For targets beyond 200m, 2 stacks are applied per hit
At maximum number of stacks, the effect removes Torn Sails and prevents additional Torn Sails Charges for the duration of the effect
Consecutive hits repair 5% for each projectile
Consecutive hits on the same target also restores Brace Strength by 2% per hit
A hit from this weapon attaches a charged metal bolt to the target for 10s. The bolt deals 10% of the weapon's damage as lightning damage every second
If another bolt is within 200m, both explode and trigger a chain of lightning that deals 12% of the weapon's secondary damage up to 4 targets between the bolts

description.general: This weapon can be charged to pierce through enemies, dealing damage as it pierces. Damage decreases per hit
